tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE device_usage_report (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    patient_id INT,
    usage_start_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    usage_end_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    usage_duration INT,
    effectiveness_rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE device_usage (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    usage_start TIMESTAMP,
    usage_end TIMESTAMP,
    usage_duration INTERVAL
);

CREATE TABLE report_data (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    report_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE devices (
    device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    patient_id UUID,
    usage_duration INTERVAL,
    usage_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE reports (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    device_id UUID,
    report_type VARCHAR(50),
    report_content TEXT,
    reviewer_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    patient_dob DATE,
    patient_gender CHAR,
    patient_condition TEXT,
    admission_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    patient_id INT,
    log_id INT,
    record_id INT
);
